ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
Let’s talk about how much we love Pokémon,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
I can’t help but smile when I see you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8201_2101_01_10:
Hey! Do you want this? It’s good stuff and sure to
come in handy!
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8201_2101_02_10: I’m glad I remembered to give it to you!
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Why don’t you
take this?
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
I realized it’s probably better off with you
than me!
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8201_2103_01_10: I have a special present for you!
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
I was wondering what you’d like,
[Name:PlayerNickname ], and decided on this!
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8201_2103_03_10: What do you think? I hope you like it!
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8201_2201_01_10: What do you wanna talk about?
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
I wanna hear you tell some stories,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
So, tell me about your love of Pokémon,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8201_2302_01_10: Thanks! I’ll take good care of it!
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
I really wanted something like this!
Hehe, thank you!
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8201_2402_01_10: That was so much fun! Let’s talk again sometime!
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8201_2401_01_10: We ended up talking a lot, huh!
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
I think I’m more chatty when I’m around you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
There are some Pokémon playing outside the
Trainer Lodge! They’re so adorable!
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8001_0701_02_10: Aah, what a happy atmosphere. I just can’t even...
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
Everyone has different ways of showing their love
of Pokémon.
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
Some folks are more straightforward and just talk
about it, while some people find other ways.
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
Regardless, it’s clear they all love Pokémon.
It makes me so happy!
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8003_0701_01_10: Gossip can be exciting if it’s about other people...
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8003_0701_02_10: But talk about me makes me nervous!
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
Even if it’s something nice, it makes me feel
restless and a bit embarrassed...
ch0017_00_leaf_salon/8003_0701_04_10: I should be careful when I talk about others!
